title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When a Java editor is opened and the user right-clicks on the left vertical ruler, a menu should appear allowing the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc. However, no menu is displayed.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the user right-clicks on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, a popup menu should appear, providing options to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR: To reproduce: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
